item.description:
From IMBD.com: A historical drama set in Roman Egypt, concerning a slave who turns to the rising tide of Christianity in the hopes of pursuing freedom while also falling in love with his master, the famous female philosophy professor and atheist Hypatia of Alexandria.

This movie is largely about Hypatia, a Greek scholar from Alexandria, considered the first notable woman in mathematics. She lived in Roman Egypt, and was killed by a Christian mob who falsely blamed her for religious turmoil.Some suggest that her murder marked the end of what is traditionally known as Classical antiquity.

A helpful review appears at http://www.weeklydig.....

We will be ready to grab drinks afterward, as the group decides.
item.name: Movie Screening: AGORA
